mapper.sql: postID, postName, sortNum, isCurrent, isDelete, theNote
mapper.select:
select a.postID, a.postName, a.sortNum, a.isCurrent, a.isDelete, a.theNote from permission_post a
a.isDelete=1
and a.postName like '%${postName}%'
order by a.sortNum asc
select a.postID, a.postName, a.sortNum, a.isCurrent, a.isDelete, a.theNote from permission_post a where a.isDelete=1 and a.postID = #{postID ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
